@title: Wiko, the Wiki Compiler
@author: David Garcia and Pau Arumi

= WiKo, the Wiki Compiler =

== Download ==

* [wiko WiKo script]
* [generateImages.sh generateImages] A bash script that takes dia, dot and eps figures and converts them into WiKo usable images: png for web and LaTeX and pdf for LaTex.
* [bib2html.py bib2html]: A python script to generate an agregated anchored html with bibtex entries from all the bibtex file in a directory so that bibtex works with html.
